link.label: CSS on an island
link.text: CSS is a collection of control system tools. This version of CSS helps to get you started. It is called 'Island' because it does not require configuration or a lot of servers around. Without (at least with minimal) configuration you can connect to an EPICS-based control system. Please proceed with the first steps page. The topic 'alarm' is most suited to get you started. By clicking the above link you open the help pages. Have fun!
